author: Staff Reporter
text:
An all-party meeting was held here under the District Election Officer and Collector C. Kathiravan on Wednesday.

The meeting was necessitated to share the details of the 32 additional voting booths designated by the Election Commission following the recommendation by the district administration. In addition, the change of buildings and addresses of 48 voting booths, and change of names for 94 voting booths, was also communicated to the representatives of the political parties here. There are 1,758 voting booths in the district, and they include urban and rural voting booths.
title: All-party meeting held
